newsitem.title: TAIWAN: Taiwan asset-backed shrs up on oil price worry.
newsitem.headline: Taiwan asset-backed shrs up on oil price worry.

text.p: Taiwan's construction and asset-backed shares rose at mid-morning on Monday on buying triggered by concerns over likely domestic oil price hikes by state Chinese Petroleum Corp, brokers said.
With 80 minutes left, constructions rose 0.16 percent while the overall index fell 0.02 percent.
BES Engineerning rose 40 cents or 1.53 percent to T$26.6 and Yuh Chen Construction rose by the daily seven percent limit to T$36.
